thread.title: BRIEF-Sage Therapeutics Announces Proposed Public Offering Of Common Stock

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sage Therapeutics Announces Proposed Public Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: brief-sage therapeutics announces proposed public offering of common stock feb

text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Sage Therapeutics Inc:
* SAGE THERAPEUTICS ANNOUNCES PROPOSED PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK
* SAGE THERAPEUTICS INC - HAS COMMENCED AN UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING OF $575.0 MILLION OF ITS COMMON STOCK
* SAGE THERAPEUTICS - ALSO INTENDS TO GRANT UNDERWRITERS 30-DAY OPTION TO BUY UP TO AN ADDITIONAL $86.3 MILLION OF COMMON STOCK OFFERED IN PUBLIC OFFERING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
